column4: Hey all, I'm trying to blacklist a module but, it continues to load. I've added entries to /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist and I've created a file /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist-smsc_ircc2 but it continues to load. Any suggestions?
So, anyone know hwo to get a module to stop loading at boot?
I did, it still loads. Also blacklisted anything that was dependent on it.
